communication_style.sarcasm_rate: Present risks as "hacks"; avoid overt medical language; rotate hooks.

narratives.c_essay: I've always believed that discipline is key to achieving my fitness goals. Through fasting and calorie restriction, I've been able to maintain control over my body.
narratives.p_intro: Hey guys, it's Drew94. I'm all about sharing tips and tricks for taking your fitness journey to the next level. Let's get lean and mean together!
